column1: [iTC_CC_ATP-SwRS-0053] On initialization, ATP generates TrainType according to DataPlugContent.CCTrainType from the CC data plug.
column2: ATP ; TrainType ; DataPlugContent.CCTrainType ; CC data plug

column1: [iTC_CC_ATP-SwRS-0054] On initialization, ATP generates CoreId according to DataPlugContent.CCCoreId read from the CC data plug.
column2: ATP ; CoreId ;  DataPlugContent.CCCoreId ; CC data plug
